biography.full:
Twisted Fate is an infamous card sharp and swindler who has gambled and charmed his way across much of the known world, earning the enmity and admiration of the rich and foolish alike. He rarely takes things seriously, greeting each day with a mocking smile and an insouciant swagger. In every possible way, Twisted Fate always has an ace up his sleeve.

Born to the nomadic river-folk of the Serpentine, the boy was taught the magic of the cards at an early age and soon learned what it was to be hated. Tolerated for the exotic goods they peddled, but shunned for their strange ways, the boy's people found only short welcomes wherever they berthed their colorful river barques. His elders claimed this was the way of the world, but their refusal to fight back against this prejudice always rankled the young boy's sensibilities.

When men who'd lost their fortunes in the gambling tents of the river folk returned in the dead of night to exact vengeance, they came bearing cudgels and emboldened by cheap rotgut. They beat the river folk back to their boats with curses and blows, eventually turning their weapons upon the boy's family. The boy could take no more and fought back, driving the men away with swift blows from their own clubs.

Proud of what he had done, the boy was stunned when his people turned their back on him. Retaliation went against the code of the river, and there could be only one punishment. Exile. His whole world falling apart around him, the boy watched helplessly as the barques of his folk sailed away without him, leaving him with nothing, alone for the first time in his life.

The boy grew to manhood drifting from town to town, trawling the gambling dens of every city he came to, using his preternatural skill at cards to earn coin to survive. That he was able to relieve the boastful, the arrogant, and the cruel of their cash was just an added bonus. Though always careful to let his opponents win at least some hands, he soon learned more ways to fight when many a disgruntled opponent sought to reclaim their lost fortunes.

Across one table, he met a fellow named Malcolm Graves and, recognizing a kindred soul, joined forces with him. The two spent years cutting a ruinous swathe across Valoran. With every con, swindle, and heist, he sought ever more dangerous means to make the cards bend to his will.

That search ended badly when a heist went wrong, resulting in Graves being taken alive, though the riverman ran free. The exact circumstances of that night and its dire consequences for both men remain shrouded in mystery, for the gambler never speaks of it. Seeking to begin again, he returned his birth name to the waters and took another: Twisted Fate.

In the time since, Twisted Fate has continued to ply his games of chance in the high parlors and low dens of every city he visits, earning countless fortunes along the way – though none can say what becomes of these winnings (other than his fine clothes) or why he seems driven to amass such wealth. He has been imprisoned with great fanfare on dozens of occasions, but there is no cell in Runeterra that has been able to hold him. Twisted Fate is always gone with morning's light, leaving only a mocking calling card to speak to his being there at all.

In Bilgewater, Twisted Fate and Graves finally had their day of reckoning. After a highly destructive running battle, and narrowly avoiding death at the hands of Gangplank, the pair finally put aside their differences, and are now once again working together.

Nigh-on impossible to track, Twisted Fate has been said to vanish into thin air every time an enemy believes they have him cornered. A useful skill indeed for a man who has parted thousands of souls from their gold...
biography.short: Twisted Fate is an infamous cardsharp and swindler who has gambled and charmed his way across much of the known world, earning the enmity and admiration of the rich and foolish alike. He rarely takes things seriously, greeting each day with a mocking smile and an insouciant swagger. In every possible way, Twisted Fate always has an ace up his sleeve.
biography.quote: “It's not gambling if you can't lose...”

modules.title: A Twist of Fate
modules.description: Get up close and personal with your favorite champions in the League of Legends Cinematic: A Twist of Fate.

modules.title: Double Down
modules.description: All eyes in Fortune's Glory were on Twisted Fate. He felt the gambling hall's many patrons regarding him with a mixture of envy, vicarious excitement, and spiteful longing for him to lose everything on the turn of the last card.

title.th_th: สถาปัตยกรรมโบราณ

description.cs_cz: Různé osady v okolí města byly vybudovány na zbytcích mnohem starší civilizace. Dávno opuštěné chrámy se přeměnily na domovy a dílny a jednotlivé budovy propojuje síť visutých lávek.
description.de_de: Verschiedene Ansiedlungen innerhalb der größeren Stadt wurden auf den Überresten einer weit älteren Zivilisation erbaut. Längst verlassene Tempel wurden in Wohnhäuser und Geschäfte umgewandelt, die durch Gerüste und Stege miteinander verbunden sind.
description.el_gr: Αρκετές συνοικίες της πόλης χτίστηκαν πάνω στα ερείπια ενός πολύ παλαιότερου πολιτισμού. Ναοί που είχαν εγκαταλειφθεί εδώ και αιώνες έχουν μετατραπεί σε κατοικίες και επιχειρηματικές εγκαταστάσεις, με περάσματα με σκαλωσιές που οδηγούν από το ένα στο άλλο.
description.en_au: Various settlements within the greater city have been built upon the remains of a far older civilization. Long abandoned temples have been converted into homes and places of business, with scaffold walkways leading from one establishment to another.
description.en_gb: Various settlements within the greater city have been built upon the remains of a far older civilization. Long abandoned temples have been converted into homes and places of business, with scaffold walkways leading from one establishment to another.
description.en_ph: Various settlements within the greater city have been built upon the remains of a far older civilization. Long abandoned temples have been converted into homes and places of business, with scaffold walkways leading from one establishment to another.
description.en_pl: Various settlements within the greater city have been built upon the remains of a far older civilization. Long abandoned temples have been converted into homes and places of business, with scaffold walkways leading from one establishment to another.
description.en_sg: Various settlements within the greater city have been built upon the remains of a far older civilization. Long abandoned temples have been converted into homes and places of business, with scaffold walkways leading from one establishment to another.
description.en_us: Various settlements within the greater city have been built upon the remains of a far older civilization. Long abandoned temples have been converted into homes and places of business, with scaffold walkways leading from one establishment to another.
description.es_ar: Algunos de los asentamientos dentro de la gran ciudad se construyeron a partir de los restos de una civilización mucho más antigua. Templos abandonados hace mucho tiempo se convirtieron en casas y negocios, con pasillos de andamio que llevan de un establecimiento a otro.
description.es_es: Son varios los asentamientos del groso de la ciudad que se han construido sobre los resquicios de una civilización mucho más antigua. Los templos, abandonados tiempo atrás, se han convertido en hogares y centros de actividad que tienen pasarelas colgantes que conducen de un establecimiento a otro.
description.es_mx: Algunos de los asentamientos dentro de la gran ciudad se construyeron a partir de los restos de una civilización mucho más antigua. Templos abandonados hace mucho tiempo se convirtieron en casas y negocios, con pasillos de andamio que llevan de un establecimiento a otro.
description.fr_fr: Plusieurs quartiers de la grande cité ont été construits sur les restes d'une civilisation bien plus ancienne. Des temples depuis longtemps abandonnés furent convertis en maisons et en comptoirs, des passerelles faites d'échafaudages reliant les établissements les uns aux autres.
description.hu_hu: A település egyes részein egy ősi civilizáció romjai fölé emeltek házakat. Rég elhagyott templomokat alakítottak át lakóházakká és boltokká, az épületeket pedig pallókból tákolt hidak kötik össze.
description.it_it: Vari insediamenti della città sono stati costruiti sui resti di una civiltà molto più antica. I templi da tempo abbandonati sono stati convertiti in case e luoghi di commercio, con passaggi che conducono da un locale all'altro.
description.ja_jp: 都市圏内に位置する様々な居住地は、遥か昔の文明の跡地に築かれたもので、長い間放置されていた寺院は住居や商いの場として転用され、各施設は足場のような通路でつながれている。
description.ko_kr: 빌지워터 도시 내의 다양한 정착촌은 그보다 훨씬 오래된 문명의 유적 위에 세워졌습니다. 오랫동안 버려졌던 신전들은 주택과 일터로 바뀌었으며, 한 곳에서 다른 곳으로 연결되는 통로들이 설치되어 있습니다.
description.pl_pl: Różne osady wewnątrz obszaru miejskiego zostały zbudowane na szczątkach dużo starszej cywilizacji. Dawno porzucone świątynie przemieniono w domy i siedziby spółek, a podwieszone chodniki prowadzą z jednego przybytku do drugiego.
description.pt_br: Vários acampamentos dentro da maior cidade foram construídos sobre os restos de uma civilização muito mais antiga. Templos abandonados há tempos foram convertidos em casas e locais de comércio, com caminhos de andaimes levando de um lugar ao outro.
description.ro_ro: Mai multe zone din marele oraș au fost construite pe ruinele unei civilizații antice. Templele abandonate de mult timp au fost transformate în case sau locuri de desfășurare a afacerilor, legate între ele de pasarele improvizate din lemn.
description.ru_ru: Некоторые районы города были построены на руинах гораздо более древней цивилизации. Давно заброшенные храмы превратили в жилые дома и торговые здания, соединенные мостками для пешеходов.
description.th_th: สิ่งปลูกสร้างมากมายของเมืองที่ยิ่งใหญ่นี้ถูกสร้างขึ้นบนสิ่งที่หลงเหลืออยู่ของอารยธรรมที่แสนจะโบราณ วิหารที่เก่าแก่ถูกเปลี่ยนให้กลายเป็นบ้านเรือนหรือไม่ก็ที่ทำธุรกิจโดยมีนั่งร้านไม้ที่เชื่อมต่อสิ่งปลูกสร้างต่าง ๆ ไว้ด้วยกัน
description.tr_tr: Şehir merkezindeki çeşitli yerleşimler, çok daha eski bir uygarlığın kalıntıları üstüne inşa edilmiş. Yüzyıllar önce terkedilmiş olan tapınaklar evlere ve işyerlerine dönüştürülmüş. Bir işletmeden diğerine iskele şeklindeki yollarla geçiliyor.
description.vn_vn: Nhiều khu dân cư trong thành phố được xây bên trên tàn tích của một nền văn minh đã rất lâu đời. Những ngôi đền bị bỏ hoang được tận dụng làm nhà ở hay chỗ buôn bán, nối với nhau bằng mấy con đường bằng ván gỗ tạm bợ.
description.zh_cn: 外城区的各个定居点都是在一个更古老的文明的残垣之上建立起来的。废弃已久的神庙被充作住宅和商户，一座座房屋之间通过飞架的栈道相连。
description.zh_tw: 比爾吉沃特城內的建築建立在遠古文明的遺跡上。長年廢棄的寺廟後來被改建為住家和商業場所，透過鷹架搭建的通道連接各個據點。

modules.title: Burning Tides
modules.subtitle: by Scott Hawkes, George Krstic, Anthony Reynolds, and John O'Bryan
modules.description: The Rat Town slaughter docks; they smell as bad as their name suggests.
